name: Wheel Ball - Pocket Mini Game Happy Yourself
name_original: Wheel Ball - Pocket Mini Game Happy Yourself
description:
Spinny ball is a challenging game.

In the game, border is made by lines with different color, the ball in the middle is dye with one of the colors, and it will fall down and bounce on the border, after the bouncing, the ball will change it's color. The goal of this game is make sure that the ball and the border hit by the ball has the same color. you can rotate the border clockwise by tap the right side of the screen or counterclockwise by tap the left side.
